BR.name: Family Bowling 3D
BR.description: Family Bowling 3D é um jogo em que qualquer um pode desfrutar do bólingue com controlos simples. Um jogo de bólingue com o Billy, Sarah, Papá e Mamã! Os três modos de jogo incluem o Modo Principal, onde irás competir contra os teus queridos membros da família; Jogo Livre, onde podes jogar como quiseres de 1 a 4 jogadores; e o modo Desafio, onde poderás enfrentar desafios difíceis! Podes jogar como quiseres selecionando a tua posição, direção, velocidade e efeito. Alcança o jogo perfeito em todos os cinco níveis diferentes!

CA.name: Family Bowling 3D
CA.description: Family Bowling 3D is a game in which anyone can enjoy bowling with simple controls. A bowling game featuring Billy, Sarah, Daddy, and Mommy! The three game modes include Main Mode, where you'll battle your fellow family members; Free Play, where you can play as you like with 1-4 players; and Challenge Mode, where you can take difficult challenges head on! You can bowl however you would like by selecting your position, direction, speed, and curve. Aim for a perfect game in all of the five different stages we've assembled!

MX.name: Family Bowling 3D
MX.description: Family Bowling 3D es un juego de controles sencillos al alcance de cualquiera. Juego de bolos protagonizado por Billy, Sarah, Papa y Mama. Los tres modos de juego incluyen Modo Principal, donde compites contra la familia; Juego Libre, juego a tu gusto con 1-4 jugadores; y Modo Desafío, donde te enfrentarás a grandes desafíos. Puedes jugar a tu antojo seleccionando posición, dirección, velocidad o curvatura de la bola. Cuando tu barra se llene, podrás usar el tiro final. Intenta hacer un juego perfecto en los 5 escenarios del juego.

US.name: Family Bowling 3D
US.description: Family Bowling 3D is a game in which anyone can enjoy bowling with simple controls. A bowling game featuring Billy, Sarah, Daddy, and Mommy! The three game modes include Main Mode, where you'll battle your fellow family members; Free Play, where you can play as you like with 1-4 players; and Challenge Mode, where you can take difficult challenges head on! You can bowl however you would like by selecting your position, direction, speed, and curve. Aim for a perfect game in all of the five different stages we've assembled!
